name: Non Ducor
description:
As a Thin Blood, it is your duty to attend the domain's needs whilst your Sire is away in a war. Be it hiding its activities from nosy reporters, ensuring the protection of its assets, or making sure it stays under the management of a worthy sire.
For better or worse, your foresight is all there is between stability and doom.

Made for the Vampire: The Masquerade Jam

Narrative

Lucas Mutter de Souza, Rafael Magnino

QA

Bruno Matarazzo, Rafael Magnino

Programming

Gabriel Soler, Lucas Henrique Batista dos Reis

Art & UI
